org.encog.ml.kmeans

Class BasicCluster

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.encog.ml.kmeans.BasicCluster
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MLCluster

    public class BasicCluster
extends Object
implements MLCluster
    Holds a cluster of MLData items that have been clustered by the KMeansClustering class.
